thread.section_title: Paramount Hotel Times Square New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Worst Rooms
thread.title_full: Worst Rooms - Review of Paramount Hotel Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Charlene H
title: Worst Rooms
text: Just checked in and had to move to a different room because we felt claustrophobic in our "Superior Queen Room". The room we're in is a little bigger with a full size bed. Nowhere in the bathroom to put personals. Nowhere in room to put clothes so you need to leave them in the suitcase. I have never stayed in such an expensive room that offered no luxury at all. So very disappointed.
